title: Bring MIMO and PAR to the Binance Smart Chain
body:
Since the Binance Smart Chain has already developed its own ecosystem next to Ethereum and provides cheaper transactions, a partial transition of MIMO and PAR should be considered.
This way, it's possible to bypass high fees on Ethereum and allow a greater userbase to interact with the services of MIMO.
author: 0x92978A9F3aeA8f30B9292e1f1fc81FB6452C4C6b
